Articles.Content:
We had a test on the US Presidents just now, and I had studied for hours. Thankfully I remembered most of what I studied... except somehow I forgot about Harry Truman. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

How the heck did I forget him!? I thought I would forget Millard Fillmore or Chester Arthur, but not the guy who authorized the dropping of the atomic bombs on Japan!

Well, shoot. What have you forgotten?

> 
> Well, shoot. What have you forgotten?

The only correct answer to that question is *I don't know* ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I don't remember forgetting anything...

*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Get it?*

EDIT: You totally stole my thunder.

> 
> The only correct answer to that question is *I don't know* ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And remembered afterwards, I might add. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I forgot my 4-digit code to get into my office this morning. I have been there for over 2 years and have never forgotten it before. I am blaming it on my brisk climb up the 5 flights this morning, which is something I haven't done in a while.

After going up the elevator to the next floor and getting into the office, I went to the restroom about an hour later and hit the code getting back in without thinking about it.

Weird.

Ah that!

The most stupid one I can remember: was going shopping for some groceries.

I walked home and when I got there I realized that: I went shopping by bike!

Doh!
